mutants.original_line: return ''.join('1' if bit == '0' else '0' for bit in state)

mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join(('' if bit == '0' else '0' for bit in state))

mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join(('1' if bit == '0' else '' for bit in state))
